product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This product has great coverage. It works in places my cell phone does not. Which is crucial for me to be able to do my job and work remotely and on the road. No slow downs with multiple devices connected. I use it every day. It is a great product! Love it!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Funny that Solis is not being transparent - Please explain why you haven't published my review?? Maybe its not painting Solis with a great reference!!! Again such a one sided business

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I was in the middle of the woods with ZERO signal. I happened to bring it just in case there was an incident... thankfully no incidents, but it worked like a charm. So far... so good.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Just got back from a trip to Peru. I couldn't seem to activate the newer Solis Lite on most days. My day passes said zero even though I had 8. The buttons are harder to operate since there's no words, you just have to know how long to hold each one for turning on and off. You Can't start a day pass without the app on your phone, while on the old device, I could start from the device. Prefer the operation design of the older model.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I got this to use at my summer home which is in a more rural area and where I didn't want to pay for internet all year long or get into a 2+ year contract. This has been a perfect solution for me and my husband and my kids when they visit to have fast WiFi. It was simple for us to set-up and was more affordable that I expected. Would recommend for anyone else who has a second home, or especially now as back-up WiFi anywhere.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I have had a Skyroam for over 5 years ....travel to SE Asia every year ...I would not leave home without it !! It works every time and in areas where WiFi signals are weak ...indispensable ! Highly recommend for travelers...and if you have questions or problems which are few ...customer service is great ...they do what they say they will do ...Jay helped me promptly and I am extremely happy !
If you travel ....BUY ONE !

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Skyroam worked great in the beginning . Fast speeds and great connectivity. By the fifth day it was almost completely the opposite. Couldn't connect or if it did was so slow it made dial up internet look fast. Contacted customer  service  multiple times was connected with high level support who couldn't  figure out what the issue was. Customer service was very friendly but if the product  doesn't  work what's the point.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Purchased Skyroam for our travels in Europe. The connectivity has always been fast. Recently had upgraded to a monthly program. Mike was very helpful and demonstrated great customer service by addressing my questions and concerns. He kept me abreast of his findings and had me back on-line in moments. In this day and age of connectivity, you just can't travel abroad without this pocket size personal WiFI. Great Job!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This portable hotspot is just as advertised.  I recently used this on a trip to the UAE and Egypt and it worked.  Yes, it was not the fastest, but when you need internet, you will get it.  International unlimited cost $99 for 1 month of service (with a speed cap at 20GB, after 20GB, you can use at diminished speeds).  I look forward to have this in my international travel bag so I will have internet anywhere I go.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Very disappointed with the connection speeds. I was expecting something better than my cellphone hotspot, instead I got something much much slower, making me wonder why I even bought this paperweight. I have only used it in the US, but if it's this slow at home with great cellphone coverage, I can only imagine how bad it will be abroad. Setup and form factor are great, but the usability truly is dissapointing.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Easy to use and carry around. I turned it in and got connected in seconds. I imagine it will be good for travel. 

The downside is that I used half of my data within the first few min (according to the app) and then just a fraction over an hour of usage, so it’s not very reliable in that way and I worry that I may run out of data when I need it. 

Overall, works well, but I’ll probably have limited use for it.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This thing is ready right out of the box and easy to use. I'm in a rural area with spotty coverage, and so far I have had very little problem getting signal. The customer service is outstanding. A real human who actually wants to help you, 24/7. I'm also a sucker for good branding and packaging. I know it's not important to some, but I loved unboxing this device. The "cool" factor with quality to back it up.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought a couple of the original versions before our trip to Rome and London. I had a little trouble getting started in using it so I messaged them on Favebook messenger and to my surprise, they messaged me back within 15 mins. Within about 10 mins after that I was on my way. It worked great. I have used it in Rome, London, MX, Honduras, Cayman Islands, and Jamaica and all with no problems. When the new version came out, I knew I was going to buy it. I guess when I heard it was new, more portable and a charger, I assumed it would be more compact but it’s not as compact as I hoped for but it worked just as great as before. My son borrowed it to make a large download on his xbox and he had no problems. They make it easy to buy more days and add it to the unit. Now if they could just figure out how to make it useable on a cruise ship, they’d make a fortune and control the market.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I'll preface this with, the first test run I had of this product was in Guatemala. So not the most developed country in the world, and I was in some pretty remote areas where this device couldn't get a signal, so I'm not sure if I would fault the device terribly for that. The locals with cell phones did have a network signal though, so it was odd that people could get a cell phone signal but this little device couldn't. But regardless, when this device did have a signal, it was very dependable and very fast, and I liked having my own, private, secure WiFi to use. Between me and my husband's 2 iPhones, we used about 2 GB of data over the course of 10 days internationally. The battery on the device easily lasted all day long too, and the app makes it very easy to track and see data usage and battery life. I'm sure this hotspot also works like a dream in more developed countries as well.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I wrote the company and asked which carrier(s) they used in the US because I need the hotspot in a place where Verizon and AT&T are strong, but T-Mobile is not. They refused to answer the question and apparently the answer is T- Mobile.
I bought 1 GB of data of Go Data...speeds were good. Then I changed to an unlimited day pass, speeds were abysmal, so the unlimited come as the price of speed.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: two quirky things: if you want pay as you go bandwidth, you need to ask Skyroam first to lower you to US-only if you don't plan to travel outside of the country to save you the $3/GB (can't do that on your end), also if you have devices that are 5ghz and 2.4ghz, let the devices that only connect on one of the bands connect first, the device will then stop transmitting on the other frequency.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I was very excited to get this to use traveling globally and also in the US. On the Solis website they give multiple options for subscriptions and costs including cheaper US only options. All of them were unavailable to me except the most expensive global option. The rest were “grayed out”. When I contacted their services, they took days to respond and didn’t fix the issue. I returned it.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I’m on a Monthly subscription - After the high speed runs out (very quickly) the unlimited ‘3G’ connection is so slow it’s almost unusable prob 60% of the time... can’t even open a web page or listen to a call on WhatsApp... 
I understand it can’t be high speed for the whole month but the step below is unacceptable for the price . I will persevere but will not be recommending this product

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This is a must have for anyone in need of a hotspot. The Solis is small enough to put in a pocket or backpack. Not only does it act as a hotspot but can also be used as a power bank. The Solis is easy to set up. There are several options to choose for the amount of gigs you want. It all depends on how you want or need to connect. The best part is the fact that there is no contract.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I have been a Skyroam user for several years now, and have been totally satisfied. The unit has been used all over the US, in DE, IT and FR. In FR, we even used it for Face Time calls from Normandy with no problems. Their customer service is excellent. I have dealt with Martha on several occasions and she is a pleasure to deal with. Overall, a great company, staff and product!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Having Skyroam Solis Lite while traveling New Zealand has been wonderful, works well for the places we've been aside from the trails. There was only one snafu when I switched subscription plans, but Tristan and Austin were able to guide me through the process in less than 24 hours. Overall, I recommend Skyroam for easy internet access and around there clock support. Thank you!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I am currently traveling through Europe and I use Solis to keep my iphone connected to wifi so I ca use it without paying international data costs. It's fantastic--the battery lasts long enough that I can wander through a city all day with it on and charge it at night. The wifi is fast and reliable, and my Solis always starts up in less than 5 minutes. So glad I got one!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I've been concerned about hotel wifi when traveling in the US and Europe. So I decided to buy the Skyroam Solis Lite. It works great and connects quickly. Exactly what I need for travel or if there's a problem with my home internet. My phone and computers connect easily. And Skyroam has daily or monthly options for using it, at reasonable prices. Definitely recommended.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This has done what I need it to do, and that is give me internet in more places. I like that it switches between carriers to get the best signal. I've seen it switch between AT&T and T-Mobile, but never Verizon. The documentation doesn't mention carriers at all. While the data seems expensive, you can buy it in blocks that don't expire with is great for infrequent use.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This product is awful! We bought this to have wifi on trips as we are constantly on the go and work remotely. Unfortunately, the signal is pretty terrible everywhere we have tried it. Additionally, it is spotty, constantly disconnecting. Half the time it doesn't connect with the app either. Not worth the money at all. Do yourself a favor and look for another product!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Bought this for my father-in-law for all his biking trips abroad.  Often times, he stays in remote b&bs with limited wifi so he is super excited to have this.  Until those trips resume, we have actually been using it a ton to support our work-from-home setup when power goes out or too many of us are on video conferences at the same time.  Would definitely recommend!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought it directly from them. It is a great device, I used for social media and work in several states and I always get decent speed and coverage. I recommended it a lot. Only thing you have to look harder if you want to pay for exact plans, I didn't get the option for US on the application from my smartphone. I better go to their web shop and buy a voucher there.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Bought this for my father-in-law for all his biking trips abroad. Often times, he stays in remote b&bs with limited wifi so he is super excited to have this. Until those trips resume, we have actually been using it a ton to support our work-from-home setup when power goes out or too many of us are on video conferences at the same time. Would definitely recommend!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: We just had to go through a cable less/ Wi-Fi less month and while we are T mobile phone users and had their hot spots due to towers being down the signal was weak. So I searched and found Solis Lite it immediately got us back online on multiple carriers depending on which window I placed it in!!! We Love Solis, and living in Hurricane prone Fl it’s a must!!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
It doesn't seem to hold a charge for more than 3 or 4 hours, which is not acceptable. 

I used a friend's last fall in London and was so pleased with it I purchased one for a month-long stay in France I just started. But as I've stated, it does not seem to hold a charge for more than about 3 hours. That's a major problem and defeats the purpose of buying it.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I was excited about the Wifi hotspot because I needed it to connect my laptop to work from home. I paid for the $90 10gb plan and that sucked my bank account dry. For $90 Solis should provide for data. I spent $200 in 4 days because my kids connected their phones and laptops to it also. So I stopped using it after two weeks and I had cable wifi installed.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Using this in a small Midwestern city in the US and it's working brilliantly. Strong signal, was able to connect and get online in just a couple of minutes. Did not need to use the app (I have an older device) and it came with 1Gb free to get started. Fast speed and solid connection. Bought to replace my old Karma Go and so far am extremely pleased.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Using this in a small Midwestern city in the US and it's working brilliantly. Strong signal, was able to connect and get online in just a couple of minutes. Did not need to use the app (I have an older device) and it came with 1Gb free to get started. Fast speed and solid connection. Bought to replace my old Karma Go and so far am extremely pleased.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I got this for my parents who frequently travel up and down the intercoastal waterway.  They were able to use their computers and smart TVs seemlessly with this device, without interruption.  Best father's day gift I could have given my dad.  It was easy for them to set up and enjoy and they loved the long battery life!  Would definitely recommend!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I got this for my parents who frequently travel up and down the intercoastal waterway. They were able to use their computers and smart TVs seemlessly with this device, without interruption. Best father's day gift I could have given my dad. It was easy for them to set up and enjoy and they loved the long battery life! Would definitely recommend!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Bought this for our camper, but it can't seem to hold a signal.  Even when it finds a signal, the network doesn't show on our phones.  Tried to connect to it at home, but phones still couldn't see it.  One of 2 laptops was able to connect at the house, but not at the camper.  So, it's pretty much useless for us.  I'll be trying to return it.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
We purchased the Skyroam for our trip to Europe. It has been a
Godsend, we are in a mobile home and as we were driving we had a wifi hotspot with us so we could use our google maps to get us to our destination. We could watch movies, FaceTime our friends back In CA, keep up with our emails. Thank you thank you. Recommend to every traveller.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I purchased the Solaris Lite to have internet access when we travel. That has not happen much yet but I wanted to be ready when we are able to go. I am impressed by the speed of unit 

Also I want to thank customer service who helped me activate unit and how to connect computer. 

Looking forward to traveling and using the Solaris hotspot

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Not loving it. Disappointed, as I had high hopes it would work in areas that my cell phone's hotspot was not working fast. Unfortunately, it does not work well in those areas and more. I also wanted to use in car for my kids to have internet on their devices but that is terrible!!! Wish I would have tries it before my trial period ended.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I had a few issues with connecting in the beginning, but those were addressed in a chat with a helpful associate.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: As an airline pilot i'm constantly on the move. Every week I pack up my bags and fly to some far flung location. Skyroam is a genius piece of kit and one I carry with me everywhere. It keeps me connected with my loved ones, allows me to use my devices as if I were at home (impressively fast) and is small enough to carry in a pocket too.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I actually only had that Solis Lite for about 3 weeks before I had to send it in to be replaced because it wasn't working properly. That was the fourth Solis Lite that I've had that has had to be replaced due to it malfunctioning. I don't really want to be too harsh, I'll just say I think they need to be made a little (a lot) better.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Very high speed WiFi! I’m in California in the middle of the Sierra Nevada’s and its working great! There’s a reason why this thing is sold out all of the time!

Other positive features include ease of use, easy set up, good app functionality, excellent customer service, long battery life, and variety of data plans to choose from.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Bought this to replace a Verizon Jetpack that was costing me 50 dollars a month even when I didn’t use it. This unit cost less and since the data plan I picked never expires I am saving a lot of money each month. Since it always scans and connects to the strongest cell system in the area I gives the best speeds possible every time

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: As a full time solo traveler and travel blogger, it's essential that I always have wifi wherever I am in the world. With Skyroam, I don't have to depend on hotels or cafes to get connected; I can work from anywhere, and constantly keep in touch with my friends, family, and fans! I've used it in 12 countries so far, and counting!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
The wheel was broken out of box so had to wait a few weeks for repair. But repair was good. 
The highest level of resistance is barely noticeable. It’s a notch above mechanical (not electric) elliptical because the motion is smooth. But you won’t get a resistance work out. I still get a pretty good workout just by going faster.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Im always on the go for work and this thing has been a life saver. The internet connects almost everywhere I go and it is extremely reliable. Since its bright orange everyone always asks about it, not sure if thats a positive but it sure is a conversation starter. Would highly recommend, it has made life so much easier for me.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Not sure about the solis lite SIMO 
Company 
They sent me a charging cable that doesn’t fit 
I call the company and the person said sorry for the inconvenience sorry for the inconvenience 
We don’t make the cable anymore 
They told me to buy a C Cable 
So my question is then why would you sell a Wi-Fi without a charging cable

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This little device allows me to stay connected while we travel. I am updating from their old version because we love it so much! We have used this device in multiple foreign countries (no, it doesn't work on cruises though). The simplicity of having an extra boost in your pocket is unmatched by any other device I have tried!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I've tested this device from home approximately 2.5 miles from the cell tower and from my vehicle approximately 13.2 mi from the same repeater tower. Stable, no drops, no flapping, and secure. Battery life is outstanding. Impressive little hotspot ... I love this Solis Lite and can't wait to take it on the road in my RV !!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Purchased this to use while traveling and have not been dissappointed, It is easy to use, the app works as it should as a no contract pay as you go solution. There quick courtous tech support helped me quickly on a early issue which was my doing.
I would recommend this to anyone looking for a wifi hotspot solution.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Haven’t been able to properly function this thing since the first day I set it up. Emailed the support group and was told to follow the set up instructions; this was after I mentioned I’m having difficulty with the plans. They offered little to know help. To this day it’s been connected once. Don’t waste your money

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Have been using this since they launched with 4g. It is a game changer, pure and simple. Always connected when traveling, no expensive phone or data charges. If you don’t have one and travel the. You are burning money. Do yourself a favor buy one.
No data was harmed writing this review because I was on skyroam!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
This device works pretty good as long as it's up your butt or in your shirt pocket. No range at all. I was 20 ft away from this device in another room and could not connect to it. The same issue for other family members in other rooms of the house. Kept it for a couple of days to give it a fair chance. The limited range of this device is very poor. I imagine you could connect 10 devices to this, if it were five people holding two devices standing shoulder to shoulder in a circle!
I know now why they charged me a $45 restocking Fee, because many people are trying to return them. The almost 40% restocking cost is to deter you to even return it.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I bought this for a temporary internet connection.
I live in the Los Angeles, County and always got a strong signal. 
Not good for gaming, streaming, watching Netflix or youtube you should probably just install regular internet at home. This will cost way more to run.. for example $6 per GB
Works great for checking email and internet sleuthing. 
The battery power depends on usage but for now I can probably get 10-12 hours of battery power.
Customer service has been helpful.
 I reached out through the online chat messenger
 and got help within minutes.
There was some trouble shooting and resetting that came up but they walk you through it .
.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Good little wifi box, will never have to worry about searching for a signal again.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I love this portable WiFi device. It is perfect for travel or even when I am working in my backyard - my new work from home office. It is easy to set up using the Solis App. I use the pay-per-day option for data so that I am only paying when I need to use it. It saves me money when I travel internationally too. I no longer need to purchase my cell service's international travel plan. The Solis connect up to 10 devices so in addition to my laptop I use it with my phone and then use WiFi calling. It is so light and portable I just stick in my bag or back pocket.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought the Solis Lite with expectations that were pretty tragic. I expected the quality to be about cell phone wifi hot spot level, which I hadn't realize was so lousy until I tried to actually stream music through it. The Solis Lite came into my life and legitimately I was blown away by how great it functions. I've had zero connectivity issues in western Massachusetts, USA, and the speed has been greater than I had hoped, and stable. I've recommended this product to a few of my friends who are now probably sick of me raving about it. Thank you, Skyroam, for making such a great little device and providing this service!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought my Skyroam Solis to take with me on a cruise. Cruise ship wifi is extremely expensive! We were able to use it in all the ports on our Panama Canal cruise from Vancouver to Fort Lauderdale. We could even do Facebook updates all the way through the canal. Fantastic! No more looking for free wifi after leaving the ship. When at home or traveling, I take it with me when hiking or even when doing chores around town. Wifi is always with me in my car. I can’t say enough about Customer Service. They are awesome! I’ve demonstrated how easy to use this device is multiple times. I should get a commission! Great Product!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
This is my second Skyroam I have purchased. I was really happy with the new smaller design however the device and service has really let me down.
I have only used the unit 3 times since I purchased it once in Bucharest once in Warsaw where I simply could not connect to the service. This was poor but I have had trouble connecting other devices in those countries 
But the biggest failure was in HK where I connected really easy but the Unlimited day Pass was so slow after the first 30 mins it was unusable. I was tempted to purchase unlimited monthly passes but I’m so worried that the service will be so slow it will not be worth it.

Massive disappointment, Can I return It?

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I have been very disappointed with my SkyRoam. I bought it specifically to make WiFi calls and send emails for work while traveling internationally. The service continues to be extremely unreliable despite people around me being able to connect to and use the cellular network for the same activities (and more) than what I am trying to use it for. Support was working for a bit, but now my chat with support refuses to work whenever I don’t have WiFi for calls (even though I have enough WiFi to stream music). I emailed support via the website yesterday to express my frustration problems and have yet to hear from anyone. Please do yourself a favor and look at other products.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This works well but only in a T-Mobile or AT&T cellular area. Could not get it to connect in my town (Verizon area) until I drove about ten miles outside of where I live. Once it connected it worked fine and did what it is suppose to do. Worked with their customer support on live chat and first he said it wouldnt work in a Verizon area and then few minutes later said it should still connect to any tower. He said he reset something on his end and said to power down and wait. Still didnt help. Tried mutiple times. Dont try their emal. They say they can help then tell you to use live chat after a couple emails. I selected yes for would I recommend but it depends where you live.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I thinkg Solis Lite wifi service is terrible. 

I've been using the service for about six weeks, and have already experienced dozens of dropped connections, which is more dropped connections than I've experience in one year using Solis 1, and more drop connections that I've experience with several other wifi services combined, over the past 13 years. 

Sometimes I'm fully connected to wifi with 5 bars, but the communication tower isn't responding, so I'm not able to navigate the internet. I have to shut down my PC, shut down the wifi device and reboot. 

If I had not been forced to switch from Solis 1 to solis Lite 5g, I wouldn't be using Solis Lite.

The service is not stable.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
This is such a great idea and device. It's only at 4G, sadly. However, as always the midwest has issues with towers connections strength being weaker than heck. How it works is it will connect to the strongest provider and you can use their connections. It's either TMobile, AT&T, One Cellular like towers. I bet it is way better overseas like Europe or Asia since networking out there is top notch. Plans are great deal and affordable. I was using unlimited per day pass so it doesn't throttle like the 20G per month.

Anyway until it has 5G+ and towers are update maybe be useful in the USA deadzones. I recommend only if you travel a lot and need to do most the work you could on the go.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Loved the original one I had but this one has been terrible!!! It heats up then stops working and you can’t even turn it off!!! Very dissatisfied. 
Had to purchase a esim as the divorce was not reliable!!! 
Support told me not to connect too many devices!!! I only had it connected to my phone!! 
The original one worked so well and was very stable so I don’t know why this new one is not working as well!
Even when at the Hotel and I’m using it in my phone it heats up terribly!
I also told people this was an amazing product but I’m not happy with the new one I have! I am only 1 week into my trip snd it really only worked gif the first 3 days!! Then it started heating up and no internet!!!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: When you turn it on, you have to install an app on your phone on which you buy the data. The hotspot uses that connection to give you internet on any other devices. You can buy it up-front in small packages or have it auto-charge. I did both options at different times - did you want to watch a movie on Netflix? My paypal was dinging so much that I didn't even get through a movie without my balance being at $45. I live in SF and my cell service is Verizon. I must've used it twice successfully, and all other times unsuccessfully, and I needed it to do my work! The Solis people were unresponsive to my emails for help or through the app. What a disappointment, and when I needed it to do my work, too.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This little device allows me to stay connected while we travel. I am updating from their old version because we love it so much! We have used this device in multiple foreign countries (no, it doesn't work on cruises though). The simplicity of having an extra boost in your pocket is unmatched by any other device I have tried!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
My Cell phone service (t-mobile) was MUCH faster at one location (4 bars of 4g) but the device would not connect to the faster service and would only connect to a 1-2 bar 4G after multiple tries/restarts

Data options are inadequate for my needs. I’m on a lot of Teams calls and can go through up to 5GB or more a day, and throttling makes it impossible to connect to meetings. Even the 20GB plan runs out in less than a week.

Not a useful device or solution for my needs, but also did not do a good job of connecting to the best available network even for minimum needs.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: After issues using our mobile carriers' international service on our first international trip that caused us quite a bit of grief, we swore off using them and looked for a different option. This little thing was exactly what we wanted! It's small and easily fits in my bag that I carry around(and would fit in most purses), the signal was almost always stellar, and the speed was fast enough for all of our needs. It felt like the battery was lasting as long as advertised, and then it charged up fast when it was low. The global day passes worked great for our needs and it saved us some money because we could both connect to it, as compared to us both having to buy individual day passes from our mobile carriers. 15/10 recommend!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I love this portable WiFi device. It is perfect for travel or even when I am working in my backyard - my new work from home office. It is easy to set up using the Solis App. I use the pay-per-day option for data so that I am only paying when I need to use it. It saves me money when I travel internationally too. I no longer need to purchase my cell service's international travel plan. The Solis connect up to 10 devices so in addition to my laptop I use it with my phone and then use WiFi calling. It is so light and portable I just stick in my bag or back pocket.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Just can't say enough great things about my Skyroam Solis. I had been looking at this for quite some time and finally decided to purchase it for travelling to JP. Used it for the first time in Tokyo everywhere with no problems. Speed was fast and the ability to charge my phone was invaluable. Needed to use Google Map constantly 12-16 hours per day and never lost my Solis wifi connection even in the Tokyo train and subway stations. The battery life was excellent even when I had to charge my phone.
If you travel, this is a must have. It's an excellent product.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Best

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Great little WiFi hotspot!  I bought this for my international travels.  In January 2022 I traveled to Barbados and Saint Lucia in the Carribean and this little guy worked exceptionally well.  As soon as I landed I was able to turn it on, connect to the WiFi and effectively have internet to get in touch with my hired shuttle driver and my friends.  The battery lasted pretty much all day and allowed me to get internet on my phone at the beach, in the ungle, wherever I needed it.  In about two weeks I used a little over 1 GB of data, but I had a bunch left from purchasing 20GB during Black Friday :) Very convenient for frequent travelers who don't want to have to worry about purchasing new SIM cards each time they move to a new spot.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
The device is easy to set up and use. It has decent battery life. The app is ok, I don't love the interface but it gets the job done. 

It is slow to connect initially as it scans the network which is frustrating as I am mostly using this as a backup for when my primary internet goes out.

The speed is unreliable, I mostly use it for Zoom meetings and it usually starts fine but within minutes I get messages saying that my internet connection is unstable or slow. 

I wish I could also check my data balance and usage on their website as I don't always have my phone handy when I need to use this on my laptop.

It's great for casual use while traveling to check emails and browse the web but I am not impressed for remote work as I use Zoom a lot.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I have set up several hotspots and this one was by far the most difficult.  I had to set up at least 2 new accounts to get into the installation process.  I was following their easy instructions but got hung up on reading the QR code.  I would scan it, after 20 seconds I got the message 'Oops. It didn't work.  Try again later."  I know I tried at lease 15 times and always got the same message but no explanation of what was wrong so I assume it was on their end.  I tried their online help and I never could find anything about that error message.  I used the online support and got the message that they were not online.  I spent at least 4 hours  and finally reached my frustration breaking point and returned the item.  Easy instructions were not.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
We are in Italy, and the internet seems very spotty. We reconnect multiple times per day and have a terrible time getting an ipad connected. Talking on WhatsApp means lots of pauses to "reconnect." Doesn't seem to matter where the solis is located (our balcony is one of the highest points in our little town). It's working OKAY, but I'm not sure I'd try taking it to Africa or a less populated country (like somewhere in South America). 

After all the WhatsApp pauses, we haven't tried to stream any shows; figure it would be too frustrating!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I love my skyroam.  It is very easy to use when I need to.  I am a teacher and teaching from home due to the pandemic.  I bought this because I don't have to buy a subscription plan also.  The other day the internet went down in my home and I was able to buy a 24-hour pass that allowed me to have wifi for just when I needed it.  The only issue I have come across is that you need to be fairly close to it.  My children on the other side of a small house were not able to pick up the signal.  All in all, I am happy to have it just in case.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I have been a Skyroam / Solis customer since close to the introduction of the first hotspot - about 2010. In that time period, I have bought and used three hotspot devices (now using Solis Lite). I have had no problems with the device or service - ever. I keep a Solis always active for local internet outage backup. And, I have used Solis in France and Japan with great success. There have been a few times that I needed to contact customer support. Each interaction was exceptional. Consider me a veteran Soliser and devoted customer.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Bought this hotspot for a quick road trip during quarantine. Because my company is all working from home, my wife and I took advantage of the flexible working hours and environments and ran away to Tahoe for a few days. We had to maintain full productivity from the bed of our truck and campsite, which worked surprisingly well with this little gadget. We had both of our laptops and a kindle connected the whole trip! My wife even streamed episodes of The Office on the drive up there.. "Working from home" just got a lot better.. : )

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Bought this hotspot for a quick road trip during quarantine. Because my company is all working from home, my wife and I took advantage of the flexible working hours and environments and ran away to Tahoe for a few days. We had to maintain full productivity from the bed of our truck and campsite, which worked surprisingly well with this little gadget. We had both of our laptops and a kindle connected the whole trip! My wife even streamed episodes of The Office on the drive up there.. "Working from home" just got a lot better.. : )

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Solis resolved my fear of being hacked while using hotel or Free Airport WiFis. Now I carry my own hotspot and I can relax knowing my connection is secure. I have used it in many, many countries and the connection has been great in all of them…even the most remote! I’m not sure how it works in US as I don’t use it there.
It is easy to use, cost effective and the battery charge lasts all day.  My travel companions (3) can connect and as long as they are close to my Solis they get their WhatsApp and email. I’ve never been so popular!! 
This is my second (upgraded) hotspot from this company and I have been totally satisfied with both. 
Great customer service helped me transfer unused daypasses from old model to new without issues.
It solved my travel problem and it can solve yours!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: their website (set up) is cumbersome. Since this operates on cell service, if your cell service isn't great, connectivity isn't either.  If you sign an auto renew and want to upgrade your plan, you have to cancel (and lose data) in order to be able to upgrade. This can also only be done when you are in range of the unit.  I expect it will be useful when I travel since I don't connect to public wifi. even with the negatives, I would still recommend it as a decent alternative to public wifi or no wifi at all

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
Bought the Solis Light when they offerred day passes in the US. There is a hidden 1GB limit. You get good service until that limit is hit, then you cannot even stream a Youtube Video.
I am sure this is done to make you upgrade to a more expensive plan. If I wanted to buy a more expensive plan I would have chosen a 5G plan through my current carrier. The day pass
approach was exactly what I was looking for until this limit showed up. Don't waste your money on this device if you want to use the day passes.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I knew the internet service in the small town I am in would not be very stable or good for calls so I got a skyroam hotspot to help alleviate any issues. I've been using it as my lifeline for work as I have to be online and on zoom calls pretty often during the day. Although I have been able to connect and take video call, often the audio cuts in and out and my teammates have trouble hearing me. I'm using it be I have to but my friend has another hotspot that works better and was less expensive.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I got Skyroam Solis Lite as a backup WiFi. While it is great for staying connected when traveling it is also handy at home. Now that everyone is working from home, if I need a little escape or need to go somewhere quiet. I can take it to work from the backyard or a park. It works great! It is light, easy to set up and you can connect many devices. It is affordable as you can get day passes as and when you need them. Looking forward to using it when we go on road trips this summer.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
It was AMAZING to use in Panama, Brazil, and Argentina! It worked like a charm. It saved me resources from having to get a SIM card for my phone! I'll be using this baby every where were I can't get access to WIFI!

I LOVE the many plan options. You can subscribe, pay as you go, or buy a day pass!

The device is sturdy, small, and simple! It doesn't take long to charge up!

The hotspot is strong once you get it to him up!

Overall, this is a wonderful purchase! I would buy again!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought the Solis-Lite 4G LTE Flobal Wi-Fi hotspot for summer Arts & Craft markets to ensure I had a secure internet connection.  If I use it I cannot use my Square to accept payments.  The Customer Support from Solis/Skyroam is non-existant!!!  The website doesn't work as it NEVER lets me sign in, even changing my password EVERY TIME I want to log in.  The device works great on our patio, but is not an option for a secure connection when used in conjuction with a Square.  I hope it works when we are camping remotely, but I have yet to try it.  Maybe it would be a good thing if it didn't work.  I am trying to 'turn off' the service until summer, and I cannot even get in touch with the company to do that.  If you buy this and have success with it.  I hope you'll include that in your reviews.  Good Luck!!!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: It was helpful having wifi, however the device constantly dropped the connection. We had to keep on reconnecting and had to switch our cell data off to avoid being charged when it automatically switched to data after the Solis device dropped the wifi connection. The speed was ok. It took a while to boot up each time turning it on. The size was fine. Not small enough to place in pocket but ok for a bag. It did seem to get very hot when using it and had to try cooling it down.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought a subscription for the 20GB's at high speed and after hours on the live chat and sending screen shots of the speed never reaching close to 1mbps after wasting gig upon gig of what is supposed to be high speed I was told I would be emailed and compensated. Its the following day and still no email or compensation and my connection still keeps going out or buffering or wont connect and wont ryn past .57mbps. Last I checked it was .37. Dont waste your money or sanity.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I recently purchased a Skyroam Solis hotspot for use while traveling internationally. In short, the product is excellent, and customer service is impressive. I have used the hotspot in Dallas, Dubai, Kolkata, and Asansol (plus other locations in the US) and have never experienced any trouble getting internet connectivity. The only time I had to contact Skyroam support, their response was prompt and efficient. Thank you Biron and Rain. I would highly recommend this product.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I purchased a Solis Lite for a trip out too Lake Powell and I was blown away with how well it functioned. I've used a few other hotspots through carriers in the past and would ALWAYS lose my connection. I can honestly say I did not lose my connection once while on my drive from San Diego to Utah. Battery life was top notch as well, I used the device for a total of 6 hours on the road and got home with more than 80% left. Can't recommend this device anymore, very content!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Skyroam is a game changer if you travel! After years of stressing out about changing SIM cards etc to get connectivity while traveling, my friend recommended skyroam. Now all I do it turn it on before I leave my hotel/apartment and I am always connected to work, voip cell service and texting. Small form factor so you can put it in a jacket pocket and have wifi at all times. Customer support answers quickly and is very efficient. Great product and company---many thanks!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought this device to work from the beach in Miami. It worked perfectly. The reviews kind of scared me because people were saying it’s not the best device but I had no issues getting service anywhere there was cell service. I choose this particular device so I can work internationally (after covid when it’s safe) without having to search for another SIM card. I highly recommend for people working from home and want to be able to travel and work from wherever you are.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I bought this device to work from the beach in Miami. It worked perfectly. The reviews kind of scared me because people were saying it’s not the best device but I had no issues getting service anywhere there was cell service. I choose this particular device so I can work internationally (after covid when it’s safe) without having to search for another SIM card. I highly recommend for people working from home and want to be able to travel and work from wherever you are.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This hotspot has been great for me since I've been working from home during the pandemic. I use it on my rooftop, where my home WiFi does not reach. Also, sometimes I take a Zoom call from the car when my kids are being too loud inside. We recently took a road trip to Montana and it was great to have WiFi for the kids so they didn't smoke the battery using my phone hotspot. The best part about it is that they use multiple networks and I don't need a physical SIM card.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: purchased to use while camping. connection quality was good and was able to use 1 device connected. any other connections would greatly slow down the system. do not expect blazing fast speeds with this. found that it was not even good enough to stream when settings were at sd quality and ended up having no use for it. it does work as expected and the daily global pricing was best option. i like that you can pay as you go so your not wasting money when not in use

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: On 11/19 Saturday I bought a 1GB pay as you plan. I used it for 1/2 mainly browsing websites. Both my phone and MacBook use low data mode for Solis. Next, the app says you have no plan. If I exhausted the data, it should say that. There is no visibility in what device used how much data. There is no support, the app live chat support no one responds. The return windows was 14 days so stuck with this device. Overall, I cannot recommend this device to anyone.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
We used the Solis on a recent Baltic cruise. The device did not work on the airplane and the cruise ship when it was out at sea because of the lack of cell towers. However the device worked well when we were in port as well as at the various port stops.

We used the Solis in Copenhagen, Stockholm, Helsinki, St. Petersburg, Tallinn, Berlin and Oslo and the device worked well in all these cities. We are an older couple and we had no problems setting up the device. We charged the device every night and so did not run out of battery power. The wifi signal was strong and we were able to surf the internet with ease.

On two occasions I phoned the support line (1-855-759-7626) and received prompt, polite and useful advice. I would not hesitate to recommend the device to friends and I would also use the device again when I am travelling.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: From the moment I started using Skyroam from my friend's hotspot, I already loved this item! I loved it so much that I even bought my own! There were few issues but the Skyroam team were there to assist and got me on track right away. You wont regret using this especially if you are the type who travels internationally like JP, Korea, Guam, etc. I have yet to explore the stateside but if their signal could reach internationally what more in the states?!

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: This little device was great on a recent road trip - I was able to work from the car while my partner was driving. The only frustrating thing is that a few times, (when switching carriers I guess), it would drop the connection for a minute. I got cut off in a couple meetings, but it always got me back online quickly. But overall, reliable, convenient, FAR better wifi than I’d get using my phone as a hotspot, and the daypasses are affordable.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment:
I just came back from a 2-week trip spanning Penang Malaysia, Bangalore India, and Singapore.

The Solis Lite worked really well in all 3 locations. I used mostly for navigation w/ Google Maps, looking up information, checking emails and social media. The unit had plenty of power to last probably 2 days.

The only trouble I ran into was in Singapore whenever I turned on the unit, it would take 3 to 5 minutes to find a network to connect to.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: Having the Skyroam while abroad was so helpful. A constant supply of WiFi helped us travel around foreign cities without getting lost and allowed us to keep in touch with our relatives at home. Occasionally the Skyroam would take a few minutes to connect to our mobile devices, but it never deterred us from going somewhere. We would simply take the Skyroam with us knowing that our devices would connect automatically in a couple minutes.

product_name: Simo Solis Lite Mobile Wi-Fi Hotspot (HS610000)
comment: I've been really disappointed with my Solis. I bought it to use in a major city in Mexico, and I still get only 1 bar of connection, even when I used the feature to connect to a variety of networks. I contacted their support and asked why my cellphone and others around me get full service, but i don't through the Solis. They essentially told me that it's good enough, even though I can't get a stable connection for conference calls.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: We have allergies and this little guy really seems to help. It also gets rid of smells in the house if there are any unpleasant odors. Great buy

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: I sweat a lot when i sleep, with this in the bed room, it really helps. Feel like the air is cleaner when i breath and i don't sweat as much.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Fantastic for the office. Works incredibly well and pulls out the moisture while cleaning the air at the same time. Highly RECOMMEND IT.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Overall the unit works well. However, I have to empty the water tank every four days. Wish they built more capacity into the unit.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: I found out about this from Best Buy's blog and is pretty happy with this. It was rather quiet and provide a nice white noise.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: I have 3 JS Vanguard 2.0 Ari Purifier and Dehumidifiers which I use in various rooms in my basement and I really like them.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Works well for my unheated storage room/pantry in the basement. Definitely improves the air circulation and musty smell.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Got this to help with my mild cat allergies. It works wonders! I am noticeably more stuffy if I forget to turn it on.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Man this unit turned out to be smaller than i thought, which is great because it doesnt take up as much space!

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: To my surprise, removed a full tank of water within 2 days. I guess the humidity in my room was really high.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Was able to keep the humidity down inside the trailer. Have been recommending to my family and friends.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Not much to say, it does the job. Cleans the air and drains the moisture.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Works as expected in a small room, like bedroom or small office or den.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: I had it for over a year now and it's done it's job perfectly. Thanks!

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Love this product. Love this even more that i got it during a sale.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: So far so good. It is definitely collecting water in our home!

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: this product works great! silent too. no complaints

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Excellent. I use for my sons room! Works awesome !

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment:
Bought two units over the holidays. One for me and one for my brother. 

I used mine in the basement (as many reviewers suggested), but is barely getting my water tank filled. 

My brother use his in his basement as well, and for some reason it fills up in like two days. 

At first I thought it was my unit that had issue, so I swapped it with my brother. Still, nothing. Bizarre. 

I guess when it works these things work incredible, but doesn't work everywhere?

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Excellent! Works perfectly. Needed it for our master closet because it is in between the bath and laundry room. We also have one in there too. Our home was built with sprayed on insulation in the walls so humidity is high already. These mini dehumidifiers are perfect. The reservoir fills after about 2 or 3 days to be emptied, and it is so quiet..I had to put my hand on the top to check it. No more smelly clothes. It also keeps our bed room smelling clean.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: Four stars may not be fair to the product, because I expected too much. The area where I'm using it is under the front porch, concrete on all sides, so more damp than a comparable living space of that size, but quite small for a conventional dehumidifier. In a closet or other small living space, the Vanguard would probably be fine. Its quiet, uses little electricity, and accumulates water in the reservoir, so it's doing its job as advertised.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: I bought this for my bathroom and it malfunctioned (we still aren't sure why - it seems to be working fine), seeping the collected water out the bottom all over the floor. My wooden floor swelled from the moisture and now the bathroom door cannot fully open, so it will need to be replaced, resulting in hundreds of dollars of damage. I contacted the seller and they did not even apologize. They just said I could ship it back to get a refund. Terrible.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: This is a small unit as described and perfect for a small bedroom. In my case I need to keep a guest room as dry as possible and it really does the trick. I have to empty the reservoir about every 3 days. Pull it out of the box. Plug it in. You are in business. It's that easy. It seems to be well built and so far communications from the seller has been helpful and frequent. I am very happy with this purchase and will buy more as needed.

product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: We bought this unit because of it's size. We live in a condo apartment that gets lots of condensation on the windows when the weather is cold and doesn't have the best air circulation because of he use of baseboard heaters. We use the 2 in 1 in one of our 150 sqft bedrooms. The dehumidifier is not excellent but good and the air purifier good. Yes, I would recommend this product but for a smaller room. And, it is quite quiet. too... a bonus!

How does this work with an ipad?  How is the data uploaded to the doctor's office?

sad to hear I have to purchase app after free trial

not always easy to get a reading  or connection, need to keep phone right adjacent to unit, seemed touchy to me
Perfect product portable and easy to use now I can have access to information anywhere in the world when needed

comment: I live near a fairly trafficked area with cars. There is also a brewery nearby. product_name: JS Vanguard 2.0 - 2-in-1 Air Purifier HEPA and Dehumidifier. Designed for small spaces. Now with mobile APP support *NEW AND IMPROVED*
comment: I live in the Pacific Northwest and after leaving one of my cars parked outside for a couple months without driving it I noticed that mold was growing on the fabric. I put a digital thermometer/humidity meter in the car with the dehumidifier running. After a day 2 cups of water were pulled out of the air in the vehicle. I emptied it a few more times with less water each day over a week and now the humidity is down to a level where mold will not grow. It would also be great for a gun safe since it is quite small but does pull a remarkable amount of moisture from the air for it's size. I'm not sure how well it would work for a whole room since I only used it in a small space but my experience so far has been positive.

comment: I've been using this air purifier/dehumidifier for a month now. I would say that it's been working very well so far. This summer has been rainy so it can get mildly hot and humid in my apartment. I was using those moisture absorbers (with the white beads) from the dollar store for a while, but I felt like it wasn't sufficient in really sucking the moisture out of the air.   I use the JS Vanguard in my living/dining room (approx 240 sqft area) or my washroom which can get quite damp (no windows). I typically leave it running while I'm at work and it accumulates about 1/4 of the small tank of water. I've also left it running over the weekend if I'm going away, and it accumulates over 1/2 a tank of water. I've yet to let it fill all the way.   In terms of air purification, I don't have any pets and there aren't any particularly terrible odours in my apartment, but I've noticed there is a lot less dust gathering on the floor of my unit, so I am very happy about that. Before using this device, I'd have a lot of dust gathering each week.  All in all, I'd say it was well worth the money. It's a beautifully designed appliance that functions very well.

I purchased this as a tool to help monitor my grandmother’s heart because she has had issues over the past couple of years and not to mention her 3 brothers and my grandmothers father all had Congestive Heart Failure and 2 out of the 3 brothers died from CHF. My grandmother has a very significant arrhythmia that you can actual identify when listening with a stethoscope however it did not register when I used this device. That was what first threw me off. So I tested it on myself, friends, family etc and it was correct about 80% of the time. It just so happened my grandmother had to go in to the hospital for another issue but she was hooked up to a “6 lead” EKG 100% of the time, in addition to a blood pressure cuff that was always attached and periodically took measurements and the finger sensor to check her blood oxygen saturation levels. (All of these wires hook in to a monitor that records all the different values and an alarm will go off if your levels go outside of the set ranges)— so when I went to see her I brought the small Kardia device with me and I took 6 different readings. All panned out every 10 minutes and I got a printout from the monitoring device every time I used the Kardia and for the most part, it was accurate HOWEVER it did not pick up on the fact that she has “chronic congestive heart failure with preserved ejection fraction” aka “diastolic heart failure.” In order to diagnose that you need either a 6 or 12 lead EKG. What was even more offputting is that it never once picked up here very obvious arrhythmia that she’s had since her 20’s. 

This device is a 1 lead EKG. It’s picking up the basic electrical current that flows through your body. This device also only programmed to pick up on 6 different heart issues. There are WAY MORE than 6 abnormalities that the heart can exhibit signs of via an EKG. For the most part a 6 lead is truly what you need. That pick up on peripheral electrical signals that run through the body. A 12 lead is the REAL DEAL but most of the time, not truly needed. As we grow older, yes of course a 12 lead helps pick up everything including the electrical current that runs through our extremities.

Lastly, and the final straw that convinced me to return it is that they avidly market the product as “FDA-cleared” (which doesn’t even come close to being “FDA-approved”) and even though they market as being “cleared” there is no evidence on their website regarding clinical trials and testing and results and comparisons. At least not that I could find, and if there are testing results on their site that I happened to missed, I still would have returned it. They also have no indication on whether or not they are seeking FDA approval. To me, that says “we will continue to say we are FDA “cleared” because most people don’t know what the difference between cleared and approved and let’s continue to sell a device that’s fancy but not entirely  accurate. Being FDA cleared just means that the FDA has recognized the device as being very similar to a predicate already being marketed and sold on the market and that the device is not harmful in any way. AKA-the FDA has verified (through an independent lab group btw, not their own government labs) that the product won’t kill you and that it’s relatively similar to another product on the market. That’s it. I am a big believer in math and science and when it comes to medicine I want to see facts, results, lab tests, clinical trials, etc etc. I won’t touch this product or any of their others with a 10 foot pole until I either see “FDA approved” or some scientific clinical information showing the efficacy of the product.
